name: Sesshou Sakura
description:
End Phase: Deal 1 Electro DMG
Usage(s): 3 (Can stack, max 6 stacks)
When you declare the end of your Round: If this summon has at least 4 Usage(s) remaining, deal 1 Electro DMG. (Consumes Usage(s))
